name: Let me out into the night so I can see the stars again
name_original: Let me out into the night so I can see the stars again
description:
A lone dweller wakes up to find that entering an artificially-induced coma-like state did little to reduce the symptoms of the illness he is suffering from.

Made for the bitsy hibernation jam, incomplete as of now, will return and post with a final version in not too long
